ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectOrder â€” Certificate of Public Convenience And Necessity GC-131 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. in respect of the North Corridor Expansion Project in Alberta
PrecisOrder (1) directing the Canada Energy Regulator (CER) to issue a CERTIFICATE OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY GC-131 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. (NGTL) for the NORTH CORRIDOR EXPANSION PROJECT in Alberta; and (2) directing the CER to issue a decision statement concerning the project.
